reviews.comments: Nuestra estadia en el depto. de Graciela fue realmente expectacular, hicimos uso de la parrilla que esta hubicada al lado de la pileta, el departamento equipado con todo lo necesario, el mobiliario y la decoracion de exelente gusto!! Muy recomendable, regresaremos sin dudar.

El depto de Graciela es tal como se muestra en las fotos, el edificio súper bien ubicado y la pileta de esas que se pueden usar de verdad.
La atención de Graciela y predisposición para resolver es inmejorable, súper recomendable!
El departamento es súper cómodo . Muy acogedor y confortable . El edificio está muy bien mantenido . La ubicación es Excelente, en un barrio muy lindo y tranquilo .- Vale la pena .!!!
reviews.response: Gracias Oscar por todo!!! tomaré en cuenta tus recomendaciones. Saludos

reviews.comments: Graciela una excelente anfitriona. El departamento moderno, amplio, mejor q en las fotos. La ubicación es excelente. Volveré
Excelente todo!!! Volvimos y volveremos!!! Altamente recomendable!!
Graciela es una anfitriona amable y eficiente, el apartamento esta muy bien ubicado y es cómodo y silencioso

El departamento es muy lindo , comodo y limpio..esta muy bien ubicado a pocas cuadras de lineas de subte, zona de outlet y zona gastronomica.Graciela nos recibio muy amablemente y nos ayudo en todo lo que necesitamos.muy recomendable.
Todo bien la estadía y el departamento. Tal cual lo pactado
Excelente departamento, muy  bien equipado, delicado y muy buen gusto,lugar ideal. Graciela una verdadera anfitriona . tuvimos un hermosa estadía!!! Seguramente volveremos!!!
Gracias por todo!! Nos vemos la próxima!
El depto es muy luminoso y la vista al jardín es muy linda.

Muy buen lugar para quedarse si querés vivir Buenos Aires como un ciudadano más. Departamento cómodo, limpio y cerca de transporte público y zona de restaurantes. Graciela fue una muy buena anfitriona, sin dudas volvería a quedar aquí.

Excelente departamento, muy tranquilo, cómodo para 3 personas, en una zona muy linda con el subte a 4 cuadras. Muy limpio y completo, con todo lo necesario y mas tb. Sin dudas volvería. Gracias Graciela por tu confianza.
Nos hemos sentido muy cómodos desde el recibimiento al departamento y Grace ha sido muy amable y nos ha manifestado mucha confianza en el momento de devolverle las llaves.
El departamento luminoso, tranquilo y cómodo. Graciela fue muy atenta y muy amable.  Gracias!
Todo muy satisfactorio. Muy cómodo el departamento.
Todo impecable. Hermoso departamento. Muy flexible con los horarios de check in y check out.

El departamento es tal cual se indica en las fotos, la localización es genial! hay restos cerca para comer rico, y es de fácil acceso, Graciela se mostró atenta a proveer de sábanas cuando fue necesario!

Nos encanto! Muchas gracias
Si volvemos, nos gustaría volver al mismo dpto!
Es una zona muy tranquila, cerca hay restaurantes y vías principales. El apartamento es cómodo, Plácido para descansar, seguro! Me gustó mucho.
Hermoso lugar a metros de las mejores tiendas de palermo , lugares para comer , pasear , etc . El apartamento hermoso y graciela muy atenta!! Super recomendable
Muy buena recepción. Lugar central y seguro. 100% recomendable.
Your place was perfect. Gracias por todo
El departamento está exactamente como en las fotos, muy buena localización, Graciela estuvo atenta a nuestras necesidades.
Excelente ubicacion , cerca de los mejores restaurants, luminoso, lindo

El apartamento de Graciela es precioso, un lugar ideal para pasar unos días tranquilos en Bs. As. !! 
Ella siempre está disponible a cualquier inquietud. 
El lugar precioso, a la mano de todo. 
Vale la pena realmente !!!
Lindo apartamento y buen lugar.
El apartamento está muy bien, es muy cómodo y la ubicación es excelente, además está a una calle de una heladería buenísima y del restaurante Don Julio para darse un buen homenaje.

El apartamento esta bien ubicado, cerca de muchos colectivos y una parada de subte,  y muchisimos comercios, como también la zona de palermo soho, muy de moda, con lindas tiendas, bares y restaurantes, pero como soy de buenos aires yo conocía la zona y me venía muy bien, por eso lo elegí. 
El edificio es muy bueno y tranquilo, el portero amable, por la noche sin ruidos, da al contrafrente donde hay un jardín con piscina la cual como estábamos fuera de temporada estaba cerrada. El departamento es luminoso y las vistas al jardín agradables. El amoblamiento en buen estado y la cama confortable. todo funciona correctamente incluso el AA frio-caliente.
Muy conveniente la lavadora y secadora que hay en el sótano del edificio para uso de la comunidad comprando una ficha en un kiosco cercano, y muy útil el teléfono fijo que permite llamar a otros teléfonos fijos, sobre todo para los que vamos a visitar a la familia.
Todo muy bien y pasamos una excelente estancia, lo recomiendo.
Muchas gracias Graciela.

El apartamento estaba genial, muy bien situado, limpio, amplio. Graciela estuvo atenta en todo momento, no pudimos conocerle porque sólo nos quedamos dos noches y no coincidimos pero hablamos varias veces. Un detalle el haber dejado planos de la ciudad y una tarjeta de bus y metro. En general muy contenta con el apartamento y el trato

Muy buena experiencia tanto en el trato, como en el alojamiento, como en la ubicación. Respecto a Graciela, en todo el momento estuvo pendiente de mi y siempre me contestó muy rapido a todo. Sobre el alojamiento es tal cual aparece en las fotos, un estudio con decoración moderna y muy confortable, calefacción y wifi funcionando a la perfección y muy limpio. La ubicación muy buena, al lado de la Plaza Armenia en pleno barrio de Palermo. Volvería a alojarmen en este estudio sin dudarlo.

Casa muy agradable y muy buena zona con numerosos restaurantes cerca y supermercados, así como panaderías. Bien agradable la zona.

Graciela siempre estuvo dispuesta a ayudar y disponible, lo cual facilitó mucho la estancia. Muy recomendable.

Como añadido decir que el gimnasio era extremadamente pequeño y la cinta para correr/trotar, así como la bicicleta estática estaban rotas desde hace varios meses. Solo funcionaba la elíptica. No había más máquinas.

El baño, desde nuestro punto de vista le faltaba algo de ventilación.

Por lo demás como decía magnífico y muy agradable. Volveríamos encantados.

Nuestra experiencia en el departamento de Graciela fue muy bueno! Ella es encantadora y amable y el lugar muy cómodo y perfecto para una pareja. Está en una zona con muchos bares y restaurantes. 
La comunicaciones fue sencilla y nos dio consejos de qué hacer en Buenos Aires. Lo recomiendo 100% :)

Gracias por todo Graciela!
reviews.response: Gracias Angie por tu visita. Espero que vuelvan pronto. ;)

reviews.comments:
Me sentí cómoda con la anfitriona, como soy argentina y conozco la zona no necesité información turística. 
El barrio muy bueno para mí, bien comunicado, acceso al edificio fácil.
Lo que se anuncia del departamento-estudio es correcto.
reviews.response: Que lastima que no me avisaste sobre la pava, te la hubiese cambiado (voy cambiando regularmente algo de la vajilla.

reviews.comments: El apartamento de Graciela es tal cual como en las fotos. Está muy bien ubicado y muy tranquilo en general. Los vecinos tocaban música muy alta a veces pero un día me quejé y no volvió a ocurrir. Les recomiendo este lugar!

Excelente la casa y el trato.
Muy atenta y dispuesta a acomodar los horarios de check in y out
Me encanta este departemento. Es muy cerca de todo en Palermo Soho and tiene todo que se falta. Graciela is muy agradable y servicial. Voy a estar en este lugar el proxima vez. Gracias!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Per. Vuelve pronto. Buen viaje.

reviews.comments: Graciela es una anfitriona excelente,muy dispuesta y ayudarnos en todo momento.

Todo muy positivo. Graciela una anfitriona encantadora, que facilita las cosas y con un gusto exquisito. El estudio impecable y comodísimo, con una decoración lindísima. El barrio precioso y muy bien comunicado. Recomendaré siempre este estudio a toda mi gente, por la amabilidad de Graciela y la comodidad, buen gusto y encanto del lugar. Mi intención es volver y me volvería a alojar allí. Lo recomiendo muchísimo.
reviews.response: Gracias Sara por tu evaluación. Ha sido muy gratificante tenerte de huésped. Un abrazo.

reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación y el equipamiento del departamento muy bueno.
reviews.response: Gracias ANgela y familia por todo. Mi casa estará disponible para ustedes. Saludos

reviews.comments: El departmento además de tener una ubicación increíble es acogedor, cálido y amplio. Graciela muy amable y nos ayudo en lo que pudo, incluso fue bastante flexible con nuestros horarios de entrada y salida. El departamento esta muy limpio y tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar aun más de Bs. As.
Graciela fue siempre muy amable y el departamento estaba impecable.

Estimados viajeros. Les cuento que estuve una semana en el estudio de Graciela y resultó ser de tomo nuestro agrado.
El edificio es muy tranquilo y la ubicación lo hace muy silencioso. 
Por otra parte, el barrio es muy grato lo que permite cenar, beber un trago, caminar a parques, en fin varias actividades recreativas de gusto de los turistas.
En cuanto al lugar, es lo mismo que aprecian en las fotos. Un espacio muy cómodo y muy bien acondicionado para tener una estadía espléndida. Muy recomendable, sin duda en un próximo viaje volvería allí!!
Nice apartment with a great location.  Graciela was an excellent host and very responsive to us.
Muito agradável o apartamento da Graciela! Confortável, limpo, bem equipado, super bem localizado e aconchegante. Me senti em casa, segura e fomos muito bem recebidos. Recomendo!
A ver mice Flat in the Heart of Palermo. Vers well situated. Graciela is a very helpful Host.

Graciela is a great and friendly host. Communication was smooth, appt os very clean and the location is perfect from bars and cafés on Armenia. It’s not a high class Appt But we were really satisfied!

Graciela’s place was absolutely great! It was exactly what I expected! The location is great, apartment very clean, the swimming pool is awesome, and many restaurants in the surrounding area! 
Graciela was an amazing host! Very easy to communicate and promptly answer my questions when I needed to reach her! 
I highly recommend to anyone traveling to Buenos Aires!
Excellent location with quiet balcony and view of gardens

The apartment of Graciela had everything you needed, the location of the apartment was perfect. In the hip district Palermo Soho with a lot of cafes, restaurants and easily to navigate and access the botanical garden, Palermo Viejo and the subte (subway network).

Graciela also was so friendly to print out tickets for us for the further travel and was super responsive to all our questions.

For Europeans: you need to take an adapter with you for power sockets.

Thank you for the nice stay!

Graciela was a pleasure to deal with. She was very quick to respond on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and made check in and check out a breeze. 

The apartment building was very centrally in Palermo Soho, which made it easy to drop off our purchases and change clothes before meals. The building was well maintained, very secure, and the neighbors were very quiet. The private balcony and shared pool/backyard were also highlights.

The apartment itself was clean and spacious with convenient kitchenette. Furnishings were basic (i.e. IKEA type) but functional and the bed was comfortable.
Le logement est spacieux  et tres lumineux. La piscine est tranquille.Nous avons pu sans probleme aller au Sauna.

Great place to stay in the trendy area of Palermo ! 
Quiet studio facing a swimming pool, practical with tasteful decoration. 
We recommend Graciela’s place !
Ótima estadia, muito bem localizado e recepção simpática!
Perfect : )
Graciela is a Nice host. We stayed for 4 nights in her appartment. Excellent location near shops en restaurants. Clean room and quick communication. We would reccomend her place to all of you!

Excellent location, restaurants, subway, markets and shops all very close by.  Although the photos of the property are accurate, the furnishings were tired and the pool was empty except for slimy green residue which created a lot of mosquitoes so we couldn't leave sliding door open.  Graciela was helpful with check in and cafe below very friendly place to wait.  We were told we would have a 2nd key to property but this never eventuated and did cause a few problems as we stayed a week. Overall a great city a good apartment in a great location.
Ich kann die Wohnung uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen. Die Lage ist super und im Sommer ist die Wohnung bestimmt genial, da sie auch einen Pool hat.

Graciela and her daughter were incredibly helpful in assisting us in checking in and checking out. Graciela was very easy to communicate with and was very accommodating. The apartment is beautiful and the location is perfect for exploring the Palermo neighborhood, which locals and tourists alike agree has the best variety of restaurants, bars and shops in BA.
reviews.response: Gracias por todo Justine. Vuelvan pronto. Saludos

reviews.comments: We had a fantastic stay at Graciela' apartment. It was very clean and comfortable. It is bigger than it looks in the pictures. Graciela was very good host and took the time to explain everything. Thank you Graciela.
Apartamento impecável seguindo o anúncio. Próximo a muitos restaurantes e bares, mercados, metrô e praças. Fiquei muito contente com a acomodação e com a atenção da Graciela.
Localização perfeita.
Muito bem localizado e muito confortável, espero voltar...

Apto muito bem localizado e condizente com as fotos. Não é um primor em limpeza (banheiro e roupas de cama e banho) mas nada que não  possa melhorar. Graciela se colocou disponível para o que precisássemos. Me hospedaria novamente.

Graciela was very lovely and accommodating. The apartment was immaculate and looked exactly as pictured.  The location was in walking distance for whatever you are looking for....great restaurants, coffee shops, shopping and night life.  She even let us stay beyond check out as our flights weren't until later in the day. I would absolutely stay there again.
Graciela's place was centrally located to the Palermo area which meant good access to great restaurants and bars.  The layout was perfect and it had anything we needed for our stay.

Great host, location and place. Would pick Graciela's place again for my next visit to BA. We could even stay until the evening since nobody else booked for the day. Super value for money. Thanks Graciela and take care
Geweldige dagen hier gehad, echt top in een topbuurt

We stayed at Graciela's flat for two nights and we really enjoyed this beautiful studio. Even though it is a studio, the flat is really big, everything you need is at your disposal and it was very clean. The studio also has a lovely terrace showing the swimming pool, unfortunately the weather was not warm enough to have a swim but it seemed very nice. To sum up I would definitely recommend this studio!
Very nice

Appartement très agréable et parfaitement situé. 
Point de départ idéal pour arpenter Buenos Aires. Métro et supermarché à proximité. Grande disponibilité de Graciela.

Great apartment in the best location near to restaurants, shops, cafes and transport. This part of Palermo has many great places to eat. Apartment is beautiful and perfect for a couple or small family with a nice little garden and pool. I would highly recommend it.
The place was fantastic, and a wonderful home base for exploring the region. Lots of great restaurants, cafes and the Subte all within walking distance.

graciela was friendly, always eager to help and fast to respond. the flat is amazing and was spotless on arrival, with all facilities working. the area is incredibly well placed, ten inutes from plaza italia and ten minutes from Palermo soho's strip of restaurants and bars. overall the property is fantastic and I would definitely recommend staying there, I certainly will again.

Graciella was very nice and attentive. The place was perfect for me. Very clean and cute. The neighbourhood was nice and lively. The street itself was quiet...but i was in a great neighbourhood. Loved it
Everything we needed was available. Fast response for questions. Great!!!

This apartment is exactly how you see it in the pictures. It is very accommodating. you are a few blocks away from the subte (metro) and bus stations. You can walk to coffee shops and the botanical gardens. Very close to Coto (supermarket). There is a quaint cafe downstairs. All in all you have everything you need here.
We spent three nights in Graciela's apartment with our son. It was exactly as described and perfect for us. The location is wonderful.

We grew to like Palermo very much and the apartment was extremely convenient for local good stuff such as the gardens and some of the museums. Near to the subway for stuff further afield. Graciela was extremely helpful and responsive to questions. 
The cafe below was just lovely and very reasonable as was the fantastic tapas bar just a couple of blocks down towards the parks. It looks like a deli but there are tables. 
Word of warning - dog poo is everywhere so keep your eyes peeled. It and the volume of litter does get cleared regularly but is soon replaced.
Was sad how quickly we became used to people sleeping on the streets but it was all over Buenos Aries. 
Lots of very good things to do in the city and suggest the free guided walks as a staring point. A day trip to Tigre was another high spot. You can get there very cheaply by train and just go on a local boat, not a tour one. Much more fun.
The turbulent history of the country is referred to in many places and even now there are regular demonstrations on the streets. 
Fascinating city

Studio was clean upon arrival and was located in a safe area in Palermo.  Graciela was friendly and available if anything came up.  Studio has a double bed, mediocre pull-out couch, and a fold-up mattress cot to accommodate a third person.  Enjoyed my stay in Buenos Aires and exploring the city.

Maravilhosos a localização e o apartamento, igual às fotos.
Graciela muito solicita, tem cartão para uso do metrô ou ônibus à disposição, só colocar crédito.
Vamos voltar.
Muito bom o apartamento para duas pessoas. Graciela muito boa anfitrião. Localizado a três quarteirões do metrô, de mercados, cafés. Super recomendo.

Graciela a été adorable et très arrangeante :)
Elle s'est adaptée à mon heure d'arrivée et a été très ponctuelle.
Elle est adorable. Attention cependant, elle ne maîtrise que très peu l'anglais (et moi, très peu l'espagnol). Mais nous avons quand même réussi à nous comprendre.
Le logement est très sympa, conforme aux photos. La petite terrasse est parfaite, surplombant la piscine et le barbecue, tout au fond.
Le quartier aussi est sympa, à 5- 10 minutes du métro et à 15 minutes du jardin Botanique.
Il y a aussi tout le quartier du vieux Palermo (Palermo Viejo) qui est hyper sympa.
Bref, je recommande !

Graciela was a great host, very helpful! I arrived at the apartment late at night and she had no trouble waiting for me to show the place. The neighborhood is amazing, close to a variety of bars and restaurants and there is a subway station a few blocks away. The place is clean and comfortable. It's an outstanding option to stay a week in BsAs, as I did.

Graciela is a perfect host. She was flexible with the check in and out times.
Also she is really friendly and helped us a lot with everything.
the apartment is great located. Palerma is one of the best areas in BA. It was very clean and fully equipped with everything you will need.
Muchas gracias Graciela

Great place! Great location! Loved Palermo Viejo. Graciela met us at 1am with the keys and was very gracious and welcoming. Clean. Comfy and excellent. Would definitely recommend and stay again! Cheryl and Mike

Overall great apartment. Location is excellent (near many bars and restaurants and close to the metro) and Graciela made us feel very welcome! We really appreciated her flexibility with the check-in time - our flight had been delayed so we arrived at the apartment very late (around midnight) but she was happy to meet us in person anyway! 
The apartment was clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again!
Everything was so easy to arrange and the apartment was perfection, no problems at all, thanks so much!
Everything was great! Graciela and her daughter Paula are both very sweet! The apartment was exactly what we wanted and was in a great neighborhood.

Graciela's apartment was exactly as described and she was a very gracious host. The apartment is clean and centrally located in Palermo, but on a nice quiet block. All the great shopping, bars and restaurants in Palermo are in walking distance. Graciela was flexible with my check in as my flight coming in was delayed and quick to answer questions. She has a hairdryer and an iron in the apartment, both of which came in handy. There is also a universal adapter in the apartment, which was a great help in charging my phone at night. Would 100% recommend the apartment to a friend!

Lovely little studio in a brilliant area. Very close to all the bars, restaurants and shops Palermo has to offer and close to Ave. Santa Fe which is very well connected for exploring further afield. Graciela was lovely - met us at the apartment to show us everything and was very contactable and accommodating, and even left a bus/metro card for us to top up and use. The apartment was nice and clean and had all the basics you'd need, and a nice little balcony too. All in all a very good experience.
Wonderful experience- clean, modern apartment. Graciela and her daughter Paula were wonderful hosts.
A lovely apartment perfect for what I wanted It was safe clean tidy and well provided with the necessities .. Very impressed , lovely hosts easy access .. Would def stay again

This  was our first time using Airbnb and Graciela answered all my pre-arrival questions promptly before we arrived. Her apartment is lovely; it is in a great suburb and looks just like the pictures on the website. She was very helpful during our trip, answering our messages, and making sure we were Re of her contact details. We recommend her lovely apartment!

Exact arrival times are always a bit dicey when it comes to coordinating flight arrivals, taxis and traffic congestion, but Graciela was quite patient with it all and greeted us in the delightful apartment.  And at the end of our stay, she was even more patient as I screwed up and left with a set of apartment keys in my pocket.  Fortunately, we were only going to Mendoza and not back to the states, so I was able to express mail them back to BA.  I am sure dealing with the traveling public can try one's soul, so I appreciate her even more.
Great location and exactly like the pictures. Graciela was lovely and very kind even let us store our bags at her apartment until we had to head to the airport. Would stay here again.

Fantastic appartment in great neighbourhood with great host.

Appartment was very clean and as described and graciela was a flexibel and kind host that helpen us getting started! Defenitly a good place to stay in BA!

The neighbourhood felt very safe, and although where the apartment was situated was actually very quiet. It was only a 5 minute walk to shops, cafes, restaurants and the subway. Taxis were cheap and easy to find, the buses were also abundant. A really great place to be!!

The apartment was absolutely perfect! Great location, spacious, with everything we needed and a great little balcony to have our breakfast on! Graciela was super helpful, particularly considering our flight was delayed when arriving to BA, so we arrived several hours later than I had originally let her know. Outstanding value for money!

Graciela is a friendly, responsive and responsible host. She was punctual at our agreed checking in and out times and responded quickly to just one problem we had with a blocked toilet.

The property is modern, well equipped and tastefully decorated and is located in an excellent area, both safe and convenient. We would stay there again 100% if we were lucky enough to get to Buenos Aires again.
